about_the_game:
Mall Manager Simulator: Prologue is a limited version of the full game to start running your local Mall now. Wishlist the full version to play the complete Mall Manager Simulator game.

Step into the world of shopping and experience what it’s like to manage a real shopping mall! Mall Manager Simulator: Prologue gives you a chance to dive into the excitement of becoming a master of management. Design, build, and manage your own shopping center, where every decision you make impacts your success!

Key Features:

  • Complete control in one place: Manage all aspects of the mall through a convenient tablet interface, allowing you to track revenues, expenses, and handle essential tasks in real-time.

  • Start with a single store and grow: At the beginning, you'll manage a simple store, but every well-placed product and carefully set price will help you reach the next level.

  • Respond to customer demands: Watch how customers react to your prices – if they’re too high, they’ll let you know! Find the right balance between profit and customer satisfaction.

  • Boost the quality index with decorations: Make your mall more attractive by adding plants and benches to increase foot traffic and maximize advertising revenue.

  • Vending machines and billboards: Place various vending machines and billboards, and watch your income grow. But beware, maintaining them is also your responsibility!

  • Limited level progression: Reach the initial levels, giving you a taste of the more complex challenges in the full version. Progress further and unlock new opportunities and upgrades!

  • Keep it clean and organized: Cleanliness is crucial! Collect trash, refill restrooms, and make sure everything is in place to keep your visitors happy.

Why try the prologue?

Mall Manager Simulator: Prologue is the perfect introduction to the full game. You’ll explore the core mechanics while facing more challenges and opportunities as you play. If you enjoy building a bigger and more complex shopping center, the full version offers endless possibilities!

Start your career with a single store and build the most successful mall in the city! Do you have what it takes to manage a shopping mall empire?

Download the prologue now and begin your journey to becoming the best mall manager!
